data.caption: Update on board meeting
data.news_body:
TVS Holdings Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 31/07/2025 inter alia to consider and approve This is in furtherance to our intimation dated 8th July 2025.
 
We wish to inform you that the Company at its Board Meeting scheduled to be held on Thursday 31st July 2025 proposes to inter-alia consider and approve the raising of funds by way of issuance of Non-Convertible Debentures on a private placement basis in one or more tranches/series over a period of time.
